Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたの知っているミルハウストは どんな人物だったんだ……？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you recall what sort of person Milhaust is...?

Entry.JapaneseText: あの人は、とても清らかな心を持ち、 自分にも他人にもとても厳しい人でした……
Entry.EnglishText: He's someone who is pure of heart, who is hard on himself and strict when it comes to dealing with others.

Entry.JapaneseText: 王女だったわたくしを叱ってくれたのも、 あの人だけ……
Entry.EnglishText: He was the only one who would scold me despite the fact that I was the queen...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、あの人はとても優しかった…… いつも、わたくしを見守ってくれていました……
Entry.EnglishText: And yet, he was very kind... He was always looking after me...
